= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Leg - flexor longus digitorum (flexor-longus-digitorum-muscle)*: flex digits
  * *Leg - flexor longus hallucis (flexor-longus-hallucis-muscle)*: flexes all joints of the big toe, plantar flexion of the ankle joint
  * *Leg - gastrocnemius muscle (gastrocnemius-muscle)*: plantar flexion, flexion of knee (minor)
  * *Leg - plantaris muscle (plantaris-muscle)*: plantar flexes foot and flexes knee
  * *Leg - popliteus muscle (popliteus-muscle)*: medial rotation and flexion of knee
  * *Leg - tibialis posterior muscle (tibialis-posterior-muscle)*: inversion of the foot, plantar flexion of the foot at the ankle; key muscle and tendon for stabilization, produce inversion and assists in the plantar flexion of the foot at the ankle
  * *Leg - somatic receptors (leg-somatic-receptors)*: somatic sensations
  * *Leg - piriformis muscle (piriformis-muscle)*: rotate laterally (outward) the thigh
  * *Leg - gluteus maximus muscle (gluteus-maximus-muscle)*: external rotation and extension of the hip joint, supports the extended knee through the iliotibial tract, chief antigravity muscle in sitting
  * *Leg - extensor digitorum brevis muscle (extensor-digitorum-brevis-muscle)*: extends digits 2, 3, and 4
  * *Leg - extensor digitorum longus muscle (extensor-digitorum-longus-muscle)*: extension of toes and ankle; Extensor hallucis brevis muscle - extension of hallux
  * *Leg - extensor hallucis longus muscle (extensor-hallucis-longus-muscle)*: extends the big toe and assists in dorsiflexion of the foot at the ankle; also is a weak invertor
  * *Leg - fibularis tertius muscle (fibularis-tertius-muscle)*: dorsi flexes and everts foot
  * *Leg - tibialis anterior muscle (tibialis-anterior-muscle)*: dorsiflex and invert the foot
